pair.value: Send a task about this record to any user of this application
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write the entry activity to DB.

acp.name: recordActivity
acp.a:expr: =#"d7d53e0e-3bcf-46ce-89df-e7fbe661cc63_MAKEACTIVITYCDT"(recordId: pv!recordId,who: pv!assignee, action: if(pv!cancelTask, #"c3ee36a1-e3e5-4c31-ad33-d41923ef5106_ACTIONSKIPPED", #"a037bff5-cbb0-4ce4-9850-4ca4fc24318c_ACTIONCOMPLETED"),taskAssigner: pp!initiator,taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, comments: pv!comments)

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:expr: =#"97597486-ded5-4b50-a2f8-f297f610d000_FORMATNAME"(pv!assignee) & if(pv!cancelTask, " skipped your task", " completed your task")

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

","You sent this task on " & pv!taskedOn & " with the following note: " & substitute(substitute(pv!taskDetails, char(10), "
"), char(13), "
"),"

 

",#"97597486-ded5-4b50-a2f8-f297f610d000_FORMATNAME"(pv!assignee) & if(pv!cancelTask, " skipped your task", " completed your task") & " with the following comment: ","

 

",substitute(substitute(pv!comments, char(10), "
"), char(13), "
"),"

")

uiExpressionForm.expression: =#"3b3eec55-9f1f-4065-88f7-03347db922b9_TASKFORM"( recordId: pv!recordId, taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, taskFrom: pv!taskFrom, taskedOn: pv!taskedOn, comments: ac!comments, cancel: ac!cancel )

pair.value: Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write the entry activity to DB.

acp.name: recordActivity
acp.a:expr: =#"d7d53e0e-3bcf-46ce-89df-e7fbe661cc63_MAKEACTIVITYCDT"(recordId: pv!recordId,who: pp!initiator, action: #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16209",taskAssignee: pv!assignee,taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, taskDeadline: pv!deadline)

uiExpressionForm.expression: =#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16252"( assignee: pv!assignee, taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, deadline: pv!deadline, taskedOn: pv!taskedOn, taskFrom: pv!taskFrom, recordId: pv!recordId, cancel: pv!cancel )
